# File lib/opensocial/connection.rb, line 95
    def service_uri(service, guid, selector, pid)
      uri = [@container[:endpoint], service, guid, selector, pid].compact.
              join('/')
      
      if @auth == AUTH_HMAC
        uri << '?xoauth_requestor_id=' + @xoauth_requestor_id
      elsif @auth == AUTH_ST
        uri << '?st=' + self.st
      end
      URI.parse(uri)
    end
